title: New: Tyler, The Creator x Toro y Moi – Hey You
body:
A year ago and a collaboration like this would have sent the buzz blogs into catastrophic meltdown, now with the disappointing release of **_GOBLIN_** well behind us, **Tyler** spitting over a **Toro y Moi** beat seems almost uninviting.

Thankfully, the beat in question is far more interesting than the majority of his XL released album, (_Yonkers_ aside), although he still has little of any worth to say. It’s crass, offensive and sort of boring to tell the truth… oh well.
